price: 39. Tai (dalis) Al-Hikma (išmintis, geros manieros ir charakteris), kurį tavo Viešpats apreiškė tau ( Muchammedai ﷺ). Ir nepriskirk Allahui jokio kito ilah (dievo), kad nebūtum įmestas į Pragarą smerkiamas ir atstumtas (nuo Allaho Gailestingumo).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِمَّآ أَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۗ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَلُومٗا مَّدۡحُورًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika mimmā awḥā ilayka rabbuka mina al-ḥik'mati walā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatul'qā fī jahannama malūman madḥūran
